alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nueces, central Jim Wells and northwestern Kleberg Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Kingsville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsville and Bishop. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 682 and 692. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells
